Blocks BEM and Components
Tabla de Contenido
Descripción
  • Alerts
  • Content Box
Molecules consist of one or more nested rules, but each of them must not be more than an atom itself. For example, using icons or buttons in molecules is valid, but using other molecules is not.
To mark an element as molecule, annotate it with the @molecule tag, followed by the name of the component.
Alerts
Grey alerts
Show example
 
Copy markup
Default grey alert, uses class .rt-alert
Close

Speakout. Be heard.Be counted

Rule of Thumb is a crowd sourced court of public opinion where anyone and everyone can speak out and speak freely. It's easy: You share your opinion, we analize and put the data ina public report.

<div class="rt-alert"><a class="rt-alert__closeBtn" href="" title="Click to close">Close</a> <h2 class="rt-alert__title">Speakout. Be heard.<span>Be counted</span></h2> <p class="rt-alert__lead">Rule of Thumb is a crowd sourced court of public opinion where anyone and everyone can speak out and speak freely. It's easy: You share your opinion, we analize and put the data ina public report.</p> </div>

Vote Item

Kanye West

Vestibulum diam ante, porttitor a odio eget, rhoncus neque. Aenean eu velit libero.

Aenean eu velit libero.</p> </div> <div class="rt-vote__item__options"> <label class="rt-vote__item__label" for="vote1">Thumbs Up <input class="rt-vote__item__thumb rt-vote__item__thumb-up" type="radio" id="vote1" name="item1"><span class="rt-vote__item__check">Check</span> </label> <label class="rt-vote__item__label" for="vote2">Thumbs Down <input class="rt-vote__item__thumb rt-vote__item__thumb-down" type="radio" id="vote2" name="item1"><span class="rt-vote__item__check">Check</span> </label> <button class="rt-btn rt-vote__item__voteNow" type="submit" title="click to vote note">Vote now</button> </div> <div class="rt-vote__results"> <div class="rt-vote__results__thumb rt-vote__results__thumb-up" style="width:64%;"> <p>64<span>%</span></p> </div> <div class="rt-vote__results__thumb rt-vote__results__thumb-down" style="width:36%;"> <p>36<span>%</span></p> </div> </div> </div>
